entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:26 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -30.9°C

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 45 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
